page.title: 08"ONE DAY" by a COLYTON adult
page.content: On a typical working day, I get up around 6.30 am, make the bed and then take my dog "Lucky" for a walk. When I get back from the walk, I make myself a cup of coffee and get ready for work. At around 7.50 am, I walk to the Hoechst CeramTec factory (see page 15) and start work at 8 o'clock. I have a coffee break at 11.00 am and then work until lunchtime at 1.30 pm. I walk home for something to eat and then back to work. I leave work at 4.45 pm and then maybe do some shopping if necessary. When I get home, I have tea and take the dog for another walk. After that I do any jobs, such as cleaning, that need to be done around the house. In the evening, if I am not going out to see a friend, I enjoy sewing. Bedtime is usually around 10.30pm.
